original_title: Thin Lizzy: Rocker On the Loose
overview: Phil Lynott was Ireland's first rock and roll international superstar. His hard man image helped him stand out to the world as one of the most influential rockers of the 1970’s. Explore Phil’s life and career as he paths the way in the rock giants Thin Lizzy.
title: Thin Lizzy: Rocker On the Loose
